abstract: The European Commission wants information about Standard & Poor’s mistake on France as the group prepares to announce plans to regulate credit rating agencies.
snippet: The European Commission wants information about Standard & Poor’s mistake on France as the group prepares to announce plans to regulate credit rating agencies.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — Just days before it was to propose sweeping regulations for credit rating agencies, the European Commission on Friday joined calls for an investigation into Standard & Poor’s after the company erroneously sent out an e-mail suggesting that it had lowered the rating on France’s sovereign debt.

headline.main: S.&P. Error on Rating of France Incites Inquiry
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Error on Rating Of France Incites Inquiry

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies

byline.original: By Stephen Castle and Liz Alderman
